summary: Taming The Serpent, a harry potter fanfic | FanFiction
title: Taming The Serpent, a harry potter fanfic | FanFiction
description: During his Fifth year, Harry Potter, Hogwarts Champion for the Five-Wizard Tournament, is asked to befriend a girl from a visiting school. Dumbledore thinks she can help Harry defeat Voldemort, but then why is she helping Death Eater-in-training Draco Malfoy! [WIP]

blog.name: strugglinggryffindorkid
blog.title: That Struggling Gryffindor kid
blog.description: Can’t lift the feather. Won’t stop trying. Wingardium LeviOsa

summary: Once you get this you have to answer with 5 things you like about yourself, publicly, then send this on to 10 of your favorite...
body:
Once you get this you have to answer with 5 things you like about yourself, publicly, then send this on to 10 of your favorite followers. (Non-negotiable, positivity is super cool!)

I was tagged by a few people: @merula-fuckin-snyde , @dratin-dragonadetinta96 , @rosierwife , @copper-ben , @askpennyhaywood , @itsyaboytalbottwinger , @ismelda-sly-girl And @ing-era so thank you friends! And sorry for taking forever to do this :/ (I’m answering as struggling gryffindor kid :D )

  1. My perseverance. Not just in charms but in other things too. I don’t want to ever give up :D
  2. My bravery (gryffindor ftw am i right? I’m kidding lol)
  3. My friends. They help me be a better person and they make me really happy. Without them I don’t know what I’d do.
  4. My transfiguration ability/skill. I can’t lift a feather but I sure can transfigure a satchel to a goat, McGonagall’s desk to a ball of yarn, and myself to a surfboard.
  5. My optimism. Even after that sleep walking curse and all the other times I land up in the hospital wing, I’m still positive I can get through even very tough days and tasks

I feel really good about myself now!

I’m honestly not sure if anyone I’ve tagged hasn’t done this already but I’ll tag a few people still. So I’ll tag @kara-lejion @short-people-unite @slytherbee @hana-the-bored-idiot and anyone else who wants to do this but hasn’t yet 😁

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: muslim wizards sneaking down to the kitchens to ask the house elves to make sure there's halal options at the feasts house elves...
body:
muslim wizards sneaking down to the kitchens to ask the house elves to make sure there’s halal options at the feasts

house elves in general are really accommodating of different dietary requirements, they see it as a challenge to make something that literally anyone can eat, especially if the person asking is nice and polite

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

i have always had this pain in the chest and breathing problems
is not because i'm nervous about my new job or anything
summary:
Draco: I can't breathe
Harry: That's because you're nervous
Draco: I'm fine! I just happen to have problems breathing and my...
body:
Draco: I can't breathe
Harry: That's because you're nervous
Draco: I'm fine! I just happen to have problems breathing and my heart is beating too fast
Harry: Anxiety
Draco: I'M FINE!
